Crea un muro de {length_m} metros de largo y {height_m} metros de alto. [/INST]
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
WallType wallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).FirstOrDefault() as WallType;

if (level != null && wallType != null)
{
    Line line = Line.CreateBound(XYZ.Zero, new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({length_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0, 0));
    Wall.Create(doc, line, wallType.Id, level.Id, UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({height_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0.0, false, false);
}</s>

<s>[INST] <<SYS>>

<</SYS>>

Inserta una ventana de {width_m} metro de ancho y {height_m} metros de alto en un muro, creando un nuevo tipo si es necesario. [/INST]
Wall hostWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;
FamilySymbol originalSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Windows).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;

if (originalSymbol != null && hostWall != null)
{
    string newTypeName = $"Window {width_m}m x {height_m}m - {{Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 4)}}";
    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    if(widthParam != null) widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({width_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters));

    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");
    if(heightParam != null) heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({height_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters));

    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;
    LocationCurve locationCurve = hostWall.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

{
    string newTypeName = $"Window {{UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({width_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}}m x {{UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({height_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}}m - {{Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 4)}}";
    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");

    if (widthParam != null && heightParam != null)
    {
        widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({width_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({height_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    }

    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;
    LocationCurve locationCurve = hostWall.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (level != null && locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

Genera un piso rectangular de {floor_w_m}×{floor_l_m} metros. [/INST]
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
FloorType floorType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).FirstOrDefault() as FloorType;

if (level != null && floorType != null)
{
    double width = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({floor_w_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters);
    double length = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({floor_l_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters);
    CurveLoop loop = new CurveLoop();
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(width,0,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(width,0,0), new XYZ(width,length,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(width,length,0), new XYZ(0,length,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,length,0), new XYZ(0,0,0)));
    Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> {{ loop }}, floorType.Id, level.Id);
}</s>

<s>[INST] <<SYS>>

Crea columnas en cada intersección de ejes. [/INST]
FamilySymbol colSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();

if (colSymbol != null && level != null && grids.Count >= 2)
{
    if(!colSymbol.IsActive) colSymbol.Activate();
    for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
    {
        for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
        {
            IntersectionResultArray results = null;
            if(grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results) == SetComparisonResult.Overlap)
            {
                 if(results != null) {
                     foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                     {
                         doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, colSymbol, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.Column);
                     }
                 }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

<s>[INST] <<SYS>>

<</SYS>>

Crea vigas entre las columnas alineadas horizontalmente. [/INST]
FamilySymbol beamSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<FamilyInstance> columns = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().OrderBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.Y).ThenBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.X).ToList();

if (beamSymbol != null && level != null && columns.Count >= 2)
{
    if(!beamSymbol.IsActive) beamSymbol.Activate();
    for(int i=0; i < columns.Count - 1; i++)
    {
        LocationPoint p1 = columns[i].Location as LocationPoint;
        LocationPoint p2 = columns[i+1].Location as LocationPoint;
        if (p1 != null && p2 != null && Math.Abs(p1.Point.Y - p2.Point.Y) < 0.01)
        {
            Line line = Line.CreateBound(p1.Point, p2.Point);
            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(line, beamSymbol, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.Beam);
        }
    }
}</s>

Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<FamilyInstance> columns = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().OrderBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.Y).ThenBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.X).ToList();

if (beamSymbol != null && level != null && columns.Count >= 2)
{
    if(!beamSymbol.IsActive) beamSymbol.Activate();
    for(int i=0; i < columns.Count - 1; i++)
    {
        LocationPoint p1 = columns[i].Location as LocationPoint;
        LocationPoint p2 = columns[i+1].Location as LocationPoint;
        if (p1 != null && p2 != null && Math.Abs(p1.Point.Y - p2.Point.Y) < 0.01)
        {
            Line line = Line.CreateBound(p1.Point, p2.Point);
            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(line, beamSymbol, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.Beam);
        }
    }
}</s>

Acota la longitud de un muro seleccionado por el usuario. [/INST]
UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference wallRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(Autodesk.Revit.UI.Selection.ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro para acotar");

if (wallRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(wallRef) as Wall;
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (wall != null && activeView != null)
    {
        LocationCurve locCurve = wall.Location as LocationCurve;
        if (locCurve != null)
        {
            Line wallLine = locCurve.Curve as Line;
            if (wallLine != null)
            {
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(activeView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

Crea una puerta de {width_m}m de ancho y {height_m}m de alto en el muro. [/INST]
Wall hostWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).FirstOrDefault() as Wall;
FamilySymbol originalSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Doors).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;

if (originalSymbol != null && hostWall != null)
{
    string newTypeName = $"Door {{UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({width_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}}m x {{UnitUtils.ConvertFromInternalUnits(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({height_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitTypeId.Meters)}}m - {{Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Substring(0, 4)}}";
    FamilySymbol newSymbol = originalSymbol.Duplicate(newTypeName) as FamilySymbol;

    if (!newSymbol.IsActive)
    {
        newSymbol.Activate();
    }

    Parameter widthParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Width");
    Parameter heightParam = newSymbol.LookupParameter("Height");

    if (widthParam != null && heightParam != null)
    {
        widthParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({width_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters));
        heightParam.Set(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({height_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    }

    Level level = doc.GetElement(hostWall.LevelId) as Level;
    LocationCurve locationCurve = hostWall.Location as LocationCurve;
    if (level != null && locationCurve != null)
    {
        XYZ insertionPoint = locationCurve.Curve.Evaluate(0.5, true);
        doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(insertionPoint, newSymbol, hostWall, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.NonStructural);
    }
}</s>

Genera un piso rectangular de {floor_w_m}×{floor_l_m} metros. [/INST]
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
FloorType floorType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).FirstOrDefault() as FloorType;

if (level != null && floorType != null)
{
    double width = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({floor_w_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters);
    double length = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({floor_l_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters);
    CurveLoop loop = new CurveLoop();
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,0,0), new XYZ(width,0,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(width,0,0), new XYZ(width,length,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(width,length,0), new XYZ(0,length,0)));
    loop.Append(Line.CreateBound(new XYZ(0,length,0), new XYZ(0,0,0)));
    Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> {{ loop }}, floorType.Id, level.Id);
}</s>

Crea columnas en cada intersección de ejes. [/INST]
FamilySymbol colSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();

if (colSymbol != null && level != null && grids.Count >= 2)
{
    if(!colSymbol.IsActive) colSymbol.Activate();
    for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
    {
        for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
        {
            IntersectionResultArray results = null;
            if(grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results) == SetComparisonResult.Overlap)
            {
                 if(results != null) {
                     foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                     {
                         doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, colSymbol, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.Column);
                     }
                 }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

Crea vigas entre las columnas alineadas horizontalmente. [/INST]
FamilySymbol beamSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsElementType().FirstOrDefault() as FamilySymbol;
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
List<FamilyInstance> columns = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<FamilyInstance>().OrderBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.Y).ThenBy(c => c.GetTransform().Origin.X).ToList();

if (beamSymbol != null && level != null && columns.Count >= 2)
{
    if(!beamSymbol.IsActive) beamSymbol.Activate();
    for(int i=0; i < columns.Count - 1; i++)
    {
        LocationPoint p1 = columns[i].Location as LocationPoint;
        LocationPoint p2 = columns[i+1].Location as LocationPoint;
        if (p1 != null && p2 != null && Math.Abs(p1.Point.Y - p2.Point.Y) < 0.01)
        {
            Line line = Line.CreateBound(p1.Point, p2.Point);
            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(line, beamSymbol, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.Beam);
        }
    }
}</s>

Acota la longitud de un muro seleccionado por el usuario. [/INST]
UIDocument uidoc = new UIDocument(doc);
Reference wallRef = uidoc.Selection.PickObject(Autodesk.Revit.UI.Selection.ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro para acotar");

if (wallRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(wallRef) as Wall;
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (wall != null && activeView != null)
    {
        LocationCurve locCurve = wall.Location as LocationCurve;
        if (locCurve != null)
        {
            Line wallLine = locCurve.Curve as Line;
            if (wallLine != null)
            {
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(activeView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

Oculta todos los muros que sean más cortos de {length_m} metros. [/INST]
double lengthThreshold = UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({length_m}, UnitTypeId.Meters);
List<Wall> walls = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).WhereElementIsNotElementType().Cast<Wall>().ToList();
List<ElementId> shortWallIds = new List<ElementId>();
View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

if (activeView != null)
{
    foreach(Wall wall in walls)
    {
        Parameter lengthParam = wall.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.CURVE_ELEM_LENGTH);
        if(lengthParam != null && lengthParam.HasValue && lengthParam.AsDouble() < lengthThreshold)
        {
            shortWallIds.Add(wall.Id);
        }
    }
    if (shortWallIds.Count > 0)
    {
        activeView.HideElements(shortWallIds);
    }
}</s>

Crea una vista de sección entre los puntos ({x1},{y1},{z1}) y ({x2},{y2},{z2}). [/INST]
ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewFamily == ViewFamily.Section);

if (vft != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ({x1},{y1},{z1});
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({x2}, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({y2}, UnitTypeId.Meters),{z2});
    XYZ midPoint = (p1 + p2) / 2;
    XYZ direction = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
    XYZ up = XYZ.BasisZ;
    XYZ viewdir = up.CrossProduct(direction);
    
    BoundingBoxXYZ sectionBox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
    Transform t = Transform.Identity;
    t.Origin = midPoint;
    t.BasisX = direction;
    t.BasisY = up;
    t.BasisZ = viewdir;
    sectionBox.Transform = t;
    sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
    sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);
}</s>

Crea una vista de sección entre los puntos ({x1},{y1},{z1}) y ({x2},{y2},{z2}). [/INST]
ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewFamily == ViewFamily.Section);

if (vft != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ({x1},{y1},{z1});
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({x2}, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({y2}, UnitTypeId.Meters),{z2});
    XYZ midPoint = (p1 + p2) / 2;
    XYZ direction = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
    XYZ up = XYZ.BasisZ;
    XYZ viewdir = up.CrossProduct(direction);
    
    BoundingBoxXYZ sectionBox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
    Transform t = Transform.Identity;
    t.Origin = midPoint;
    t.BasisX = direction;
    t.BasisY = up;
    t.BasisZ = viewdir;
    sectionBox.Transform = t;
    sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
    sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);
}</s>

Crea una vista de sección entre los puntos ({x1},{y1},{z1}) y ({x2},{y2},{z2}). [/INST]
ViewFamilyType vft = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewFamilyType)).Cast<ViewFamilyType>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.ViewFamily == ViewFamily.Section);

if (vft != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ({x1},{y1},{z1});
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({x2}, UnitTypeId.Meters),UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits({y2}, UnitTypeId.Meters),{z2});
    XYZ midPoint = (p1 + p2) / 2;
    XYZ direction = (p2 - p1).Normalize();
    XYZ up = XYZ.BasisZ;
    XYZ viewdir = up.CrossProduct(direction);
    
    BoundingBoxXYZ sectionBox = new BoundingBoxXYZ();
    Transform t = Transform.Identity;
    t.Origin = midPoint;
    t.BasisX = direction;
    t.BasisY = up;
    t.BasisZ = viewdir;
    sectionBox.Transform = t;
    sectionBox.Min = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(-10, UnitTypeId.Meters), 0);
    sectionBox.Max = new XYZ(UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(p1.DistanceTo(p2)/2, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(10, UnitTypeId.Meters), UnitUtils.ConvertToInternalUnits(20, UnitTypeId.Meters));
    
    ViewSection.CreateSection(doc, vft.Id, sectionBox);
}</s>

        {

    if (detailIds.Count > 0)
    {
        Group group = doc.Create.NewGroup(detailIds);
        if (group != null)
        {
            group.Name = "Detalle Típico 1";
        }
    }
}</s>

Assign all walls to the '{workset_name}' workset. [/INST]
if (doc.IsWorkshared)
{
    Workset ws = new FilteredWorksetCollector(doc).OfKind(WorksetKind.UserWorkset).FirstOrDefault(w => w.Name == "{workset_name}");
    if (ws != null)
    {
        FilteredElementCollector collector = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_Walls).WhereElementIsNotElementType();
        foreach (Element e in collector)
        {
            Parameter p = e.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.ELEM_PARTITION_PARAM);
            if (p != null && !p.IsReadOnly)
            {
                p.Set(ws.Id.IntegerValue);
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

Encuentra todas las colisiones entre tuberías y vigas. [/INST]
ICollection<ElementId> pipeIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_PipeCurves).WhereElementIsNotElementType().ToElementIds();
ICollection<ElementId> beamIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralFraming).WhereElementIsNotElementType().ToElementIds();

if(pipeIds.Count > 0 && beamIds.Count > 0)
{
    List<ElementFilter> beamFilters = new List<ElementFilter>();
    foreach(ElementId beamId in beamIds)
    {
        Element beam = doc.GetElement(beamId);
        if(beam != null) beamFilters.Add(new ElementIntersectsElementFilter(beam));
    }
    LogicalOrFilter clashFilter = new LogicalOrFilter(beamFilters);
    ICollection<ElementId> clashingPipeIds = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, pipeIds).WherePasses(clashFilter).ToElementIds();
}</s>

Cambia un panel de vidrio de un muro cortina por un panel sólido. [/INST]
Wall curtainWall = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Cast<Wall>().FirstOrDefault(w => w.WallType.Kind == WallKind.Curtain);
FamilySymbol solidPanelType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FamilySymbol)).Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(fs => fs.Family.FamilyCategory.Id.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInCategory.OST_CurtainWallPanels && (fs.Name.Contains("Solid") || fs.Name.Contains("Sólido")));

if (curtainWall != null && solidPanelType != null)
{
    CurtainGrid grid = curtainWall.CurtainGrid;
    if (grid != null)
    {
        ElementId panelIdToChange = grid.GetPanelIds().FirstOrDefault();
        if (panelIdToChange != ElementId.InvalidElementId)
        {
            Panel panelToChange = doc.GetElement(panelIdToChange) as Panel;
            if (panelToChange != null) panelToChange.ChangeTypeId(solidPanelType.Id);
        }
    }
}</s>

Agrupa una tabla de planificación de habitaciones por Nivel. [/INST]
using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Group Schedule"))
{
    t.Start();
    ViewSchedule schedule = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewSchedule)).Cast<ViewSchedule>().FirstOrDefault(vs => vs.Definition.CategoryId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInCategory.OST_Rooms);

    if (schedule != null)
    {
        ScheduleDefinition def = schedule.Definition;
        if (def != null)
        {
            SchedulableField schedulableField = def.GetSchedulableFields().FirstOrDefault(f => f.ParameterId.IntegerValue == (int)BuiltInParameter.ROOM_LEVEL_ID);
            if (schedulableField != null)
            {
                ScheduleField field = def.AddField(schedulableField);
                ScheduleSortGroupField sortGroupField = new ScheduleSortGroupField(field.FieldId);
                sortGroupField.ShowHeader = true;
                def.AddSortGroupField(sortGroupField);
                def.IsItemized = false;
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

{
    t.Start();
    if(doc.IsWorkshared)
    {
        UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
        ICollection<ElementId> selectedIds = localUidoc.Selection.GetElementIds();
        
        Workset workset = new FilteredWorksetCollector(doc).OfKind(WorksetKind.UserWorkset).FirstOrDefault(ws => ws.Name == "{workset_name}");

            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

Copia todos los muros del {source_level} al {target_level}. [/INST]
using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Copy Walls"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level1 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "{source_level}");
    Level level2 = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().FirstOrDefault(l => l.Name == "{target_level}");

    if (level1 != null && level2 != null)
    {
        ICollection<ElementId> wallsToCopy = new FilteredElementCollector(doc, level1.Id).OfClass(typeof(Wall)).Select(e => e.Id).ToList();
        double elevationDiff = level2.ProjectElevation - level1.ProjectElevation;
        XYZ translation = new XYZ(0, 0, elevationDiff);
        if (wallsToCopy.Count > 0)
        {
            ElementTransformUtils.CopyElements(doc, wallsToCopy, translation);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

Dado un muro, obtén los materiales y sus volúmenes. [/INST]
UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
Reference pickedRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(Autodesk.Revit.UI.Selection.ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro");

Dictionary<string, double> materialVolumes = new Dictionary<string, double>();
if (pickedRef != null)
{
    Wall wall = doc.GetElement(pickedRef) as Wall;
    if (wall != null)
    {
        Parameter areaParam = wall.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.HOST_AREA_COMPUTED);
        if (areaParam != null && areaParam.HasValue)
        {
            double wallArea = areaParam.AsDouble();
            WallType wallType = wall.WallType;
            if (wallType != null)
            {
                CompoundStructure cs = wallType.GetCompoundStructure();
                if (cs != null)
                {
                    foreach(CompoundStructureLayer layer in cs.GetLayers())
                    {
                        Material material = doc.GetElement(layer.MaterialId) as Material;
                        if(material != null)
                        {
                            double volume = layer.Width * wallArea; 
                            materialVolumes[material.Name] = volume;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}</s>

Crea una nueva hoja {sheet_size} y coloca la vista '{view_name}' en ella. [/INST]
using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Sheet"))
{
    t.Start();
    string sheetNumber = "A-101";
    FamilySymbol titleBlock = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_TitleBlocks).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(tb => tb.Name.Contains("{sheet_size}"));
    View viewToPlace = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(ViewPlan)).Cast<View>().FirstOrDefault(v => v.Name == "{view_name}");

    if (titleBlock != null && viewToPlace != null)
    {
        ViewSheet newSheet = ViewSheet.Create(doc, titleBlock.Id);
        if (newSheet != null)
        {
            newSheet.Name = "Planta Arquitectónica - {view_name}";
            newSheet.SheetNumber = sheetNumber;
            BoundingBoxUV sheetBox = newSheet.Outline;
            UV centerUv = (sheetBox.Min + sheetBox.Max) / 2;
            XYZ centerPoint = new XYZ(centerUv.U, centerUv.V, 0);
            Viewport.Create(doc, newSheet.Id, viewToPlace.Id, centerPoint);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Hide Annotation Categories"))
{
    t.Start();
    Categories categories = doc.Settings.Categories;
    View activeView = doc.ActiveView;

    if (activeView != null)
    {
        foreach(Category cat in categories)
        {
            if(cat.CategoryType == CategoryType.Annotation && cat.get_AllowsVisibilityControl(activeView))
            {
                 activeView.SetCategoryHidden(cat.Id, true);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

{
    t.Start();
    WallType wallType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(WallType)).Cast<WallType>().FirstOrDefault(wt => wt.GetCompoundStructure() != null);
    Material material = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Material)).Cast<Material>().FirstOrDefault(m => m.Name.Contains("{material_name}"));

    if (wallType != null && material != null)

        if (cs != null && cs.LayerCount > 0)
        {
            cs.SetMaterialId(0, material.Id);
            wallType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Columns at Grids"))
{
    t.Start();
    FamilySymbol columnSymbol = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_StructuralColumns).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == "{column_type_name}");
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).Cast<Level>().OrderBy(l => l.Elevation).FirstOrDefault();
    List<Grid> grids = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Grid)).Cast<Grid>().ToList();
    if (columnSymbol != null && level != null)
    {
        if (!columnSymbol.IsActive) columnSymbol.Activate();
        for (int i = 0; i < grids.Count; i++)
        {
            for (int j = i + 1; j < grids.Count; j++)
            {
                IntersectionResultArray results;
                if(grids[i].Curve.Intersect(grids[j].Curve, out results) == SetComparisonResult.Overlap)
                {
                    if (results != null && !results.IsEmpty)
                    {
                        foreach (IntersectionResult ir in results)
                        {
                            doc.Create.NewFamilyInstance(ir.XYZPoint, columnSymbol, level, Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.StructuralType.Column);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Sheet with Legend"))
{
    t.Start();
    FamilySymbol titleBlock = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfCategory(BuiltInCategory.OST_TitleBlocks).WhereElementIsElementType().Cast<FamilySymbol>().FirstOrDefault(tb => tb.Name.Contains("{sheet_size}"));

            XYZ centerPoint = new XYZ(centerUv.U, centerUv.V, 0);
            Viewport.Create(doc, newSheet.Id, legendView.Id, centerPoint);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Create Extrusion Roof"))
{
    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    RoofType roofType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(RoofType)).FirstOrDefault() as RoofType;

    if (level != null && roofType != null && doc.ActiveView != null)
    {
        CurveArray profile = new CurveArray();
        profile.Append(Arc.Create(new XYZ(-10,0,0), new XYZ(10,0,0), new XYZ(0,5,0)));
        Plane plane = Plane.CreateByNormalAndOrigin(XYZ.BasisY, XYZ.Zero);
        ReferencePlane refPlane = doc.Create.NewReferencePlane(plane.Origin, plane.Origin + XYZ.BasisX, plane.Normal, doc.ActiveView);
        if(refPlane != null)
            doc.Create.NewExtrusionRoof(profile, refPlane, level, roofType, 0, 20);
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

{

    Material paintMaterial = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Material)).Cast<Material>().FirstOrDefault(m => m.Name == "{material_name}");

                if (interiorFace != null)

                    doc.Paint(w.Id, interiorFace, paintMaterial.Id);
                }
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

Acota la longitud de un muro seleccionado por el usuario. [/INST]
using (Transaction t = new Transaction(doc, "Dimension Wall"))
{
    t.Start();
    UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
    Reference wallRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(Autodesk.Revit.UI.Selection.ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un muro para acotar");
    if(wallRef != null)
    {
        Wall wall = doc.GetElement(wallRef) as Wall;
        if(wall != null)
        {
            LocationCurve locCurve = wall.Location as LocationCurve;
            Curve wallCurve = locCurve != null ? locCurve.Curve : null;
            if(wallCurve != null && wallCurve is Line)
            {
                Line wallLine = wallCurve as Line;
                ReferenceArray refs = new ReferenceArray();
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(0));
                refs.Append(wallLine.GetEndPointReference(1));
                XYZ pt1 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(0).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                XYZ pt2 = wallLine.GetEndPoint(1).Add(XYZ.BasisZ * 2);
                Line dimLine = Line.CreateBound(pt1, pt2);
                doc.Create.NewDimension(doc.ActiveView, dimLine, refs);
            }
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

    t.Start();
    Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
    DuctType ductType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(DuctType)).Cast<DuctType>().FirstOrDefault(d => d.Shape == ConnectorProfileType.Rectangular);
    MEPSystemType systemType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(MEPSystemType)).Cast<MEPSystemType>().FirstOrDefault(s => s.SystemClassification == MEPSystemClassification.SupplyAir);

    if (level != null && ductType != null && systemType != null)
    {
        XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0, 0, 3 / 0.3048);
        XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, 0, 3 / 0.3048);
        Duct duct = Duct.Create(doc, systemType.Id, ductType.Id, level.Id, p1, p2);

        if (duct != null)
        {
            Parameter widthParam = duct.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.RBS_CURVE_WIDTH_PARAM);
            Parameter heightParam = duct.get_Parameter(BuiltInParameter.RBS_CURVE_HEIGHT_PARAM);
            if (widthParam != null && !widthParam.IsReadOnly) widthParam.Set({width_mm} / 304.8);
            if (heightParam != null && !heightParam.IsReadOnly) heightParam.Set({height_mm} / 304.8);
        }
    }
    t.Commit();
}</s>

Añade un punto al Path of Travel seleccionado. [/INST]
UIDocument localUidoc = uidoc;
Reference pickedRef = localUidoc.Selection.PickObject(ObjectType.Element, "Selecciona un Path of Travel");

if (pickedRef != null)
{
    PathOfTravel pot = doc.GetElement(pickedRef) as PathOfTravel;
    if (pot != null)
    {
        IList<XYZ> points = pot.GetPath();
        if (points != null && points.Count >= 2)
        {
            XYZ midPoint = (points[0] + points[1]) / 2;
            points.Insert(1, midPoint); 
            pot.Update(points);
        }
    }
}</s>

Crea un suelo con un hueco circular de radio {radius_m}m en el centro. [/INST]
Level level = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(Level)).FirstOrDefault() as Level;
FloorType floorType = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).OfClass(typeof(FloorType)).FirstOrDefault() as FloorType;

if (level != null && floorType != null)
{
    XYZ p1 = new XYZ(-10 / 0.3048, -10 / 0.3048, 0);
    XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, -10 / 0.3048, 0);
    XYZ p3 = new XYZ(10 / 0.3048, 10 / 0.3048, 0);
    XYZ p4 = new XYZ(-10 / 0.3048, 10 / 0.3048, 0);
    CurveLoop outerLoop = new CurveLoop();
    outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1, p2));
    outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2, p3));
    outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3, p4));
    outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4, p1));

    XYZ center = XYZ.Zero;
    double radius = {radius_m} / 0.3048;
    CurveLoop innerLoop = new CurveLoop();
    innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisY * radius));
    innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisY * radius));

    Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { outerLoop, innerLoop }, floorType.Id, level.Id);
}</s>

    ElementLevelFilter levelFilter = new ElementLevelFilter(level.Id);
    FilterableValueProvider provider = new ParameterValueProvider(new ElementId(BuiltInParameter.ELEM_FAMILY_PARAM));
    FilterStringRuleEvaluator evaluator = new FilterStringEquals();
    FilterRule famNameRule = new FilterStringRule(provider, evaluator, "{family_name}");
    ElementParameterFilter famFilter = new ElementParameterFilter(famNameRule);
    LogicalAndFilter andFilter = new LogicalAndFilter(new List<ElementFilter> { catFilter, levelFilter, famFilter });
    doors = new FilteredElementCollector(doc).WherePasses(andFilter).ToList();
}</s>

Crea un DirectShape esférico con un radio de {radius_m} metros. [/INST]
double radius = {radius_m} / 0.3048;
List<GeometryObject> solids = new List<GeometryObject>();
Frame frame = new Frame(XYZ.Zero, XYZ.BasisX, XYZ.BasisY, XYZ.BasisZ);
Arc arc = Arc.Create(frame.Origin, radius, 0, Math.PI, frame.BasisX, frame.BasisY);
Line line = Line.CreateBound(arc.GetEndPoint(1), arc.GetEndPoint(0));
CurveLoop profile = CurveLoop.Create(new List<Curve> { arc, line });
Solid sphere = GeometryCreationUtilities.CreateRevolvedGeometry(frame, new List<CurveLoop> { profile }, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
solids.Add(sphere);
DirectShape ds = DirectShape.CreateElement(doc, new ElementId(BuiltInCategory.OST_GenericModel));

if (ds != null)
{
    ds.SetShape(solids);
    ds.Name = "Esfera DirectShape";
}</s>

List<GeometryObject> solids = new List<GeometryObject>();

Arc arc = Arc.Create(frame.Origin, radius, 0, Math.PI, frame.BasisX, frame.BasisY);
Line line = Line.CreateBound(arc.GetEndPoint(1), arc.GetEndPoint(0));
CurveLoop profile = CurveLoop.Create(new List<Curve> { arc, line });
Solid sphere = GeometryCreationUtilities.CreateRevolvedGeometry(frame, new List<CurveLoop> { profile }, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
solids.Add(sphere);

    CurveLoop outerLoop = new CurveLoop();
    outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1, p2));
    outerLoop.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2, p3));

    XYZ center = XYZ.Zero;
    double radius = {radius_m} / 0.3048;
    CurveLoop innerLoop = new CurveLoop();
    innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center + XYZ.BasisY * radius));
    innerLoop.Append(Arc.Create(center + XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisX * radius, center - XYZ.BasisY * radius));

    Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop> { outerLoop, innerLoop }, floorType.Id, level.Id);

if(slabTypeToDuplicate != null && foundationLevel != null)
{
    FloorType newSlabType = slabTypeToDuplicate.Duplicate("{type_name}") as FloorType;
    if(newSlabType != null)
    {
        CompoundStructure cs = newSlabType.GetCompoundStructure();
        if (cs != null)
        {
            cs.SetLayerWidth(cs.GetFirstCoreLayerIndex(), ({thickness_cm} * 10) / 304.8);
            newSlabType.SetCompoundStructure(cs);
            XYZ p1 = new XYZ(0,0,0); XYZ p2 = new XYZ(10,0,0); XYZ p3 = new XYZ(10,10,0); XYZ p4 = new XYZ(0,10,0);
            CurveLoop profile = new CurveLoop();
            profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p1,p2)); profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p2,p3)); profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p3,p4)); profile.Append(Line.CreateBound(p4,p1));
            Floor.Create(doc, new List<CurveLoop>{profile}, newSlabType.Id, foundationLevel.Id);
        }
    }
}</s>
